```{r}
library(tidytext)
library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
library(wordcloud)
library(reshape2)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
#load the rda file
load(file = "textdata.Rda")

#code to get started
#"pasted this part from Emily :), original code by Jeny :)"
df_tidy <- df_full %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, content) %>% 
  anti_join(stop_words) 

#simple frequency code for common words
df_count %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)

#word cloud of 100 most frequently written words
df_word <- df_tidy %>%
  count(word) %>%
  with(wordcloud(word, n, max.words = 100))

#calls for bing sentiment lexicon 
bing_lex = get_sentiments("bing")

#categorizing words as positive or negative
df_bing %>%
  right_join(bing_lex) %>%
  filter(!is.na(sentiment)) %>%
  count(sentiment, sort = TRUE)

#word clod of 50 most frequently used negative and positive words
df_bingword %>%
  inner_join(bing_lex) %>%
  count(word, sentiment, sort = TRUE) %>%
  acast(word ~ sentiment, value.var = "n", fill = 0) %>%
  comparison.cloud(colors = c("red", "green"),
                   max.words = 50)


```
